properties.displayName: Import LDAP Data Interchange Format File Via Ldifde.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "-i" and ProcessCommandLine contains "-f") and (FolderPath endswith "\\ldifde.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "ldifde.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the execution of "Ldifde.exe" with the import flag "-i". The can be abused to include HTTP-based arguments which will allow the arbitrary download of files from a remote server.
